SAINT.Name: Friday of the Second Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 1st Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: By night and by day we fall down before Thee, O Lord, imploring Thee to grant unto our souls remission of sins, that in peace we may worship and glorify Thee, O Lover of mankind.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O Lord, rebuke me not in Thine anger
nor chasten me in Thy wrath.
SEXTE.STICHOS: For Thine arrows are fastened in me.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Hearken unto my prayer, O Lord
and unto my supplication give ear.
SEXTE.STICHOS: I said: I will take heed to my ways lest I sin with my tongue.
